description:
Stuck Pixel Fixer is a software solution that can fix stuck pixels, reduce screen burn-in and improve the quality of images displayed on a screen.                     
A stuck pixel is a bright dot of colour most noticeable when the rest of the screen is black. Stuck pixels are fairly common on high resolution LCD screens. Stuck pixels sometimes start working again with time unless they appear black on a white background, these are known as dead pixels.

Stuck Pixel Fixer repairs stuck pixels through rapid, repetitive operation and resonance. Most stuck pixels are repaired within 20 minutes. How do I check for stuck pixels?                     
Use Stuck Pixel Fixer to also detect stuck pixel, using the extremes of each color from the palette, to easily spot pixel not matching the color of the page. Easy as 1,2,3!
